Sentencas: Optimum pressure ratios of a regenerative gas turbine (RGT) power plant with and without a solid oxide fuel cell are investigated.
Titulo: Optimum Performance of a Regenerative Gas Turbine Power Plant Operating With/Without a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: It is shown that assuming a constant specific heat ratio throughout the RGT plant, explicit expressions can be derived for the optimum pressure ratios leading to maximum thermal efficiency and maximum net work output.
Titulo: Optimum Performance of a Regenerative Gas Turbine Power Plant Operating With/Without a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: It would be analytically complicated to apply the same method for the hybrid system due to the dependence of electrochemical parameters such as cell voltage on thermodynamic parameters like pressure and temperature.
Titulo: Optimum Performance of a Regenerative Gas Turbine Power Plant Operating With/Without a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: So, the thermodynamic optimization of this system is numerically studied using models of RGT plant and solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Optimum Performance of a Regenerative Gas Turbine Power Plant Operating With/Without a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Irreversibilities in terms of component efficiencies and total pressure drop within each configuration are taken into account.
Titulo: Optimum Performance of a Regenerative Gas Turbine Power Plant Operating With/Without a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The main results for the RGT plant include maximization of the work output at the expenses of 2-4% lower thermal efficiency and higher capital costs of turbo-compressor compared to a design based on maximum thermal efficiency.
Titulo: Optimum Performance of a Regenerative Gas Turbine Power Plant Operating With/Without a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: On the other hand, the hybrid system is studied for a turbine inlet temperature (TIT) of 1 250-1 450 K and 10-20% total pressure drop in the system.
Titulo: Optimum Performance of a Regenerative Gas Turbine Power Plant Operating With/Without a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The maximum thermal efficiency is found to be at a pressure ratio of 3-4, which is consistent with past studies.
Titulo: Optimum Performance of a Regenerative Gas Turbine Power Plant Operating With/Without a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: A higher TIT leads to a higher pressure ratio; however, no significant effect of pressure drop on the optimum pressure ratio is observed.
Titulo: Optimum Performance of a Regenerative Gas Turbine Power Plant Operating With/Without a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The maximum work output of the hybrid system may take place at a pressure ratio at which the compressor outlet temperature is equal to the turbine downstream temperature.
Titulo: Optimum Performance of a Regenerative Gas Turbine Power Plant Operating With/Without a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The work output increases with increasing the pressure ratio up to a point after which it starts to vary slightly.
Titulo: Optimum Performance of a Regenerative Gas Turbine Power Plant Operating With/Without a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The pressure ratio at this point is suggested to be the optimal because the work output is very close to its maximum and the thermal efficiency is as high as a littler less than 60%.
Titulo: Optimum Performance of a Regenerative Gas Turbine Power Plant Operating With/Without a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
Optimum Performance of a Regenerative Gas Turbine Power Plant Operating With/Without a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
